channel.title: Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.description: I study Bioinformatics at Technical University Munich an Ludwig-Maximilians University in my Masters. I came to the ListLab as part of my master pratical course where I contributed to implementing a web application and API for SPONGE. Further, I am now working as a student programmer with Dr. Blumenthal.
